name: places/ChIJqfH9WevzwokR9m498XIE1aI
adrFormatAddress: 4915 Broadway, New York, NY 10034, USA

originalText.text:
In response to your reply, yes you have a right to relocate and expand but don’t you think your clients should know so necessary changes can be made?  2) yes I had the option of finishing my last two sessions at the location you lied and said you are no longer there and to risk BURNING my face AGAIN? I rather not thank you. 3) FYI the hair on my face was still there until I changed to a more customer friendly business, so NO MONEY NOT WELL SPENT. You should stop making excuses and start listening to where you went wrong and do better instead of fighting your ex clients ( check past bad reviews) It wont get you far. DO BETTER and actually keep your appointments.

I've been receiving laser treatments from her for over a year. I have two more sessions remaining, and I must say, if you don't schedule your appointments on her time, you're out of luck. There have been numerous instances where I made appointments and took time off work, only to call and receive no response, followed by a text message saying she had already left. Recently, I wanted a session before a wedding but couldn't get it done because she was at another location. I understand she needs to make money, but it's frustrating when I've already paid in full and can't schedule my sessions at a convenient time for me. Now, after a week of calling and receiving no response, I find out she has moved an hour away. Why wasn't I informed so I could have gotten my sessions sooner? Other than these issues, her sessions were effective during the year and more that I received them, although the hair is still growing back. Overall, it was a decent experience, but I would advise against paying her in full as you may end up regretting it.

originalText.text: Hello I have to say even though sometimes you have to wait a little longer then you expected she does makes up for it so you won't regret the wait. Above all that her work is excellent you will see results the first day. She is very professional on what she does makes sure you get your money's worth and mind you she is the lowest Laser and skin removal service  in MANHATTAN, BROOKLYN Or BRONX I've been able to find. She has a cool vibe and easy to work with. She does calls to see if you ok and check up on you. I think  she is the best you will ever find for your money and you will be happy with the results  at the end of the day that is what matters. If you are reading this you can stop searching cause this is it.

originalText.text: I have had the best treatment at Tesoro Laser Spa. I adore Janira she is very flexible and always treats me like family. The package I received is for 6 sessions and only 475 that is a steal if you ask me. Her establishment is very welcoming, organized and beautiful. She has gained me as a lifetime customer.

originalText.text: I have been a client for over 10 years, doing Laser for anti-aging benefits. Pleased with my outcome, especially the texture and brightness of my skin.

originalText.text: Great and accurate results!! I have been coming to her for years and never had a problem. She will try to make you feel comfortable and at ease during any procedure you get.
